summary:
This mod adds bare hands with long nails as hand equipments (like the gloves/gauntlets) to the game, with 10 color variations.
They all given with barehand fight perk that increases brawling damages, scaled as wearing daedric gauntlets.

This is a stand along mod. It doesn\'t replace anything.
descriptionHtml:
I\'m not an English speaker, sorry for poor English.
<<Description>>

This mod adds bare hands with long nails as hand equipments (like the gloves/gauntlets) to the game, with 10 color variations.
They all given with barehand fight perk that increases brawling damages, scaled as wearing daedric gauntlets.

This is a stand along mod. It doesn\'t replace anything.

Claws-color: cloth armor gloves

to craft: Blacksmith forges, craft category:Misc, with 1 leather stripe
to improve: not applicable (AR=0 cloth armor)
to Enchant: Work like ordinary gloves/gauntlets


Claws Light-color: light armor guantlets. craft category:Leather, with same AR as Dragon Scale Gauntlets.

to craft: Blacksmith forges, category:Leather, with 1 leather
to improve: Worktables, with 1 leather
to Enchant: Work like ordinary gloves/gauntlets


Claws Heavy-color: Heavy armor guantlets, craft category:Iron, with same AR as Daedric Gauntlets.

to craft: Blacksmith forges, category:iron, with 1 iron ingot
to improve: Worktables, with 1 iron ingot
to Enchant: Work like ordinary gloves/gauntlets

Color Variations:(Please refer to picture for better approach)

Aqua, Blcak, Blue, Bright Red, Dark Red, Gold, Green, Pink, Purple, Silver

Item FormIDs (use console command to get them instantly)
0x00100c~0x001029 (hex)

<<Requirements>>

None, i guess. Should be worked fine with vanilla and cbbe bodies.

<<Optional Files>>

WIP

<<Credits and Thanks>>
(C)Bethesda
(C)Caliente cbbe body for hand meshes http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
and all mod tools developers, tutorial writers, talented modders. Without your efforts I can do nothing.
author: kaw
